msbt.message: The Bug-Off's gonna start soon, !Can't wait to show off my net- handling skills, .
THE BUG-OFF'S GONNA START!I'm all limbered up and ready to go! You're my rival, so you best get buggy, !
The Bug-Off starts at nine today!I bumped up my push-ups to three sets of a thousand per day just so I could build extra Bug-Off muscles!You watch, ! I'm gonna have bugs in my pockets for WEEKS!
I swear on my epic triceps that there's no way I'm gonna lose to you, !
Have you ever done visualization exercises to help you catch bugs?Close your eyes Imagine the bug in your net Open your eyesAnd then you'll see I swiped that bug when you weren't looking, !

, I'm gonna level with you.As my greatest rival, I need you to go for the gold. Go all out. No mercy. I need a challenge.I WILL DESTROY YOU, AND RULE THE BUG-CATCHING SCENE WITH A SIX-LEGGED FIST!Which is to say I want to have a bunch of fun today! Let's, uh, both try our best, ?
I put weights on my net so waving it around would really buff up my arms!Heh heh I feel way ripped.
The Bug-Off is over. I wish more bugs got to witness my muscles!
How did ya do? I mostly came away with muscle aches! Ooof! Always stretch before bug hunting!
Bugs can do all sorts of things like fly and jump They're unusually nimble and light on their feet.I gotta train harder to have that sort of confidence in my explosiveness!
Hey! Listen up! The one who doesn't give up? They're the one who never gave up! Remember that!
Pace yourself, !I don't wanna hear that you can't move tomorrow 'cause your muscles are sore, .

Just because you can't catch any bugs doesn't mean you should give up, !Like my instructor said, "It's not about winning or losing! It's about NOT quitting so you don't not win!"Most important lesson I ever learned in my life.
